gameDesc: The game, part of the Wizarding World franchise, takes place in the late 1800s, a century prior to the events chronicled in the Harry Potter novels. The player controls a student enrolled in the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry who learns to wield an array of magical abilities and objects. With the assistance of fellow students and professors, the protagonist embarks on a journey to unearth an ancient secret concealed within the wizarding world.
reviews: There is only a story mode, yay!
Flying is a bit hard, but it is still good.
Azkaban is only a corridor with no fighting?

gameDesc: In Nier Automata, players enter a post-apocalyptic world on the verge of human extinction. Controlling androids called YoRHa units, they engage in intense combat against alien invaders using various weapons and abilities. The game blends action, RPG elements, and a gripping narrative, exploring themes of humanity and existence. As players unravel the mysteries of this desolate world, they forge alliances and make impactful choices that shape the story's outcome, leaving them with an unforgettable gaming experience.
reviews: Enjoyable but lacks depth and variety.

gameDesc: Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony is a visual novel and adventure game that follows a group of high school students trapped in a twisted killing game orchestrated by a mysterious bear named Monokuma. Players must investigate crime scenes, gather evidence, and participate in class trials to uncover the truth behind the murders. The game features a dark and thrilling narrative, complex characters, and mind-bending plot twists, providing an engaging experience for fans of mystery and suspense.
reviews: Mind-blowing plot twists and engaging mysteries.

gameName: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
gameDesc: In The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, players embark on an epic adventure in the kingdom of Hyrule. As the hero, Link, players must explore the vast open world, solve puzzles, battle enemies, and uncover the secrets of the ancient land. The game offers a seamless and immersive experience with dynamic weather, a physics-based gameplay system, and a wide variety of weapons, tools, and abilities. With its breathtaking visuals, expansive world, and captivating gameplay, Breath of the Wild sets a new standard for open-world exploration.
reviews: A masterpiece that redefines open-world gaming.
